lead_paragraph: The Libyan pro-government forces freed 13 foreigners after a battle to recapture part of the city, an Islamic State stronghold.

headline.print_headline: Libyans Free 13 Foreigners Held by ISIS
headline.main: Libyan Forces, Fighting ISIS in Surt, Free 13 Foreign Captives
